mapper.select: SELECT oid ,SUM(`value`)power FROM `forklift` where `oid` in(${oid}) and (`addtime` between #{stTime} and #{edTime}) ;
select id,state,intervalTime, LastRunTim,updateTime from queue_task t where t.type=0 and t.methodName=#{methodName};
select id,state,intervalTime, LastRunTim,updateTime from queue_task t where ip=#{ip};
